title: Allahabad University Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: University of Allahabad has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the Allahabad University Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply and fill out the application form before the last da...
